sentences.sentence: Methods: Using the miniature ultrasonic probe checked 84 patients suspected of submucosal tumors.
sentences.translation: 方法对84例疑黏膜下肿瘤的患者进行微探头超声检查。

sentences.sentence: To investigate the endoscopic diagnosis and treatment of cystic submucosal tumors in the duodenum.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨十二指肠黏膜下囊肿的内镜诊断及治疗。

sentences.sentence: Result All of the neurons expressed SP also expressed CRF1 receptor in submucosal plexus of guinea-pig.
sentences.translation: 结果：豚鼠黏膜下层神经丛中所有表达SP的神经元上均有CRF1受体的表达。
